Strong Swing.effect text: Unaimed melee attacks deal 1 additional damage

Wind Knocker.effect text: If your melee attack beats the targets Armor and Dodge scores, make a Brawn check of 10 to stun them

Wild Strike.effect text: Once per combat, make a melee attack. You can use your unused action(s) to boost the damage by 3 per unused action

Surge of Strength.effect text: Once per combat, add 1d6 of damage to a melee attack

Double Slash.effect text: Attack a target twice, but don't add positive modifiers from weapons

Repetitive Strike.effect text: +1 to a die if you already attacked this turn

In the Zone.effect text: If you land 3 attacks in a single turn, roll an extra die on Swift checks and add 10 meters of movement until your next turn ends

Long Shot.effect text: Add +2 to ranged attacks over 25 meters away

Quick Adjustment.effect text: If you missed your first ranged attack this turn, add +2 to your next attack roll

Pinpoint Accuracy.effect text: Add your Intellect to a die on ranged aimed shots

Never Miss.effect type: Once per combat, your next ranged aimed attack hits, even if it is out of your weapon's max range or if the target is behind cover

Trigger Happy.effect text: In the first round of combat, make two ranged weapon attacks

Run and Gun.effect text: If you started this turn behind cover and will end this turn out of cover, make an additional ranged attack

Point Blank.effect text: Ranged attacks made within 10 meters deal +1 damage

Termination.effect text: If you killed or set an enemy to 1 HP, reload all weapons and make a bonus ranged attack

Armor Up.effect text: +1 to Armor Score when wearing armor

Unscathed.effect text: Ignore the first status effect in combat

Impervious.effect text: Once per rest make a brawn check of 6. On success, you can't take more than 1 damage per attack until the end of your next turn

Near Invincible.effect text: Double the amount of HP gained from Overshield

Bulking Up.effect text: Lose 5 meters of movement. Gain +2 HP whenever you permanently gain Brawn

Taunt.effect text: force an enemy within movement range to move towards you and use ALL their actions to melee attack you on their next turn. At full health, this is a bonus action

Behind Me.effect text: Interrupt a ranged attack and move up to 15 meters to intercept it

Aid the Tank.effect text: If you were hit since your last turn, gain +2 additional HP when healed and roll an additional attack die
